    /**
     * @type {{[P in TaskGroupIds]: {id: P, label: string}}}
              ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

    const taskGroups = {
        parseHTML: {
            id: 'parseHTML',
            label: 'Parse HTML & CSS'
        },

            id: 'styleLayout',
            label: 'Style & Layout'
        },
    }
